title: Awesome List Updates on May 21, 2024

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Databases Implemented in Go

*   [pebble (‚≠ê5.4k)](https://github.com/cockroachdb/pebble) - RocksDB/LevelDB inspired key-value database in Go.

### Geographic

*   [geoos (‚≠ê523)](https://github.com/spatial-go/geoos) - A library provides spatial data and geometric algorithms.

items.title: Awesome Embedded Rust
items.content_text:
### Firmware projects / WIP

*   [LuLuu (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/fu5ha/luluu): Firmware for a custom RP2040-based display controller that streams animated images from a microSD card to a small LCD display.
items.content_html:
Firmware projects / WIP

  • LuLuu (‚≠ê8): Firmware for a custom RP2040-based display controller that streams animated images from a microSD card to a small LCD display.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### (requires Neovim 0.5)

*   [zeioth/none-ls-autoload.nvim (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/zeioth/none-ls-autoload.nvim) - Auto-load/Auto-unload none-ls sources installed with mason. It supports builtin sources and external sources.

### Color / Diagnostics

*   [rachartier/tiny-devicons-auto-colors.nvim (‚≠ê120)](https://github.com/rachartier/tiny-devicons-auto-colors.nvim) - Automatically updates nvim-web-devicons colors based on your current colorscheme.
items.content_html:
(requires Neovim 0.5)

  • zeioth/none-ls-autoload.nvim (‚≠ê25) - Auto-load/Auto-unload none-ls sources installed with mason. It supports builtin sources and external sources.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Resources / Official Resources

*   [Documentation](https://vuejs.org/)
*   [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/vuejs/)
*   [Release Notes (‚≠ê51k)](https://github.com/vuejs/core/releases)
*   [IDE Language Support (‚≠ê6.3k)](https://github.com/vuejs/language-tools?tab=readme-ov-file#vue-language-tools)
*   [Awesome Vite (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/vitejs/awesome-vite)

### Components & Libraries / Utilities

*   [unplugin-vue-components (‚≠ê4.1k)](https://github.com/unplugin/unplugin-vue-components) - üì≤ On-demand components auto importing for Vue.
*   [unplugin-auto-import (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/unplugin/unplugin-auto-import) - Auto import Vue APIs on-demand for Vite, Webpack and Rollup.
items.content_html:
Resources / Official Resources

  • Documentation
  • GitHub Repo
  • Release Notes (‚≠ê51k)
  • IDE Language Support (‚≠ê6.3k)
  • Awesome Vite (‚≠ê16k)

Components & Libraries / Utilities

  • unplugin-vue-components (‚≠ê4.1k) - üì≤ On-demand components auto importing for Vue.
  • unplugin-auto-import (‚≠ê3.6k) - Auto import Vue APIs on-demand for Vite, Webpack and Rollup.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### General / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-signal-forms (‚≠ê147)](https://github.com/timdeschryver/ng-signal-forms) - Signal powered Angular Forms.
*   [ngx-sub-form (‚≠ê314)](https://github.com/cloudnc/ngx-sub-form) - Utility library for breaking down an Angular form into multiple components.

### Form Controls / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-color (‚≠ê441)](https://github.com/scttcper/ngx-color) - üé® Color Pickers from Sketch, Photoshop, Chrome, Github, X & more.
*   [ngx-color-picker (‚≠ê469)](https://github.com/zefoy/ngx-color-picker) - Color picker widget.
*   [angular-colorful (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/ngx-eco/angular-colorful) - A tiny color picker component for modern Angular apps.

### Validation / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-valdemort (‚≠ê204)](https://github.com/Ninja-Squad/ngx-valdemort) - Simpler, cleaner Angular validation error messages.
*   [validointi (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/validointi/validointi) - This is a library to help you validate your template driven forms.
*   [ngx-reactive-forms-utils (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/pjlamb12/ngx-reactive-forms-utils) - Provides easy validation error display and custom validators.
*   [angular-reactive-validation (‚≠ê32)](https://github.com/davidwalschots/angular-reactive-validation) - Reactive Forms validation shouldn't require the developer to write lots of HTML to show validation messages. This library makes it easy.

### Mixed utilities / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [rxweb (‚≠ê400)](https://github.com/rxweb/rxweb) - Tons of extensively featured packages for Angular, Vue and React Projects.
*   [ngspot (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/DmitryEfimenko/ngspot) - Collection of awesome Angular libraries.
items.content_html:
General / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-signal-forms (‚≠ê147) - Signal powered Angular Forms.
  • ngx-sub-form (‚≠ê314) - Utility library for breaking down an Angular form into multiple components.

Form Controls / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-color (‚≠ê441) - üé® Color Pickers from Sketch, Photoshop, Chrome, Github, X & more.
  • ngx-color-picker (‚≠ê469) - Color picker widget.
  • angular-colorful (‚≠ê10) - A tiny color picker component for modern Angular apps.

Validation / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-valdemort (‚≠ê204) - Simpler, cleaner Angular validation error messages.
  • validointi (‚≠ê24) - This is a library to help you validate your template driven forms.
  • ngx-reactive-forms-utils (‚≠ê6) - Provides easy validation error display and custom validators.
  • angular-reactive-validation (‚≠ê32) - Reactive Forms validation shouldn't require the developer to write lots of HTML to show validation messages. This library makes it easy.

Mixed utilities / Google Developer Experts

  • rxweb (‚≠ê400) - Tons of extensively featured packages for Angular, Vue and React Projects.
  • ngspot (‚≠ê31) - Collection of awesome Angular libraries.
